channel.title: Checkinv pi
channel.description:
I need some assistance with adding checkinv on my pi. Yes there are a lot of tutorials on how to implement this. But I don't want ones where you have to relog to see your inventory or there inventory goes into yours. I was wondering if I could get help adding something similar to this with an interface as checkinv.
Ex.
http://prntscr.com/3hiyvg

item.title: Checkinv pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ohokay:

Copy their equipment into an array, put the array into your inventory, refresh inventory items

^ It’s really not hard.
Make a 2D array and then when you execute the command, fill the array via copying their items (I say 2d because {Item id, amount}). Then show the shop interface, and throw their items onto it. Done and done.

Read full topic

item.title: Checkinv pi
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Copy their equipment into an array, put the array into your inventory, refresh inventory items
